snippet: Increasing leadership skills key to growth, academics say.
abstract: Increasing leadership skills key to growth, academics say.
lead_paragraph: Companies in India and elsewhere in Asia are increasingly sending managers to Western business schools to "groom future leaders," Miki Tanikawa writes in the International Herald Tribune.

headline.main: Asian Firms Tap Western Business Schools

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
